title: BARD - Pearl Clutching & Sovereignty
itunes:title: BARD - Pearl Clutching & Sovereignty
description:
Mark and Gary link up Sunday morning to discuss a busy week in the law as they review some video that's been driving Mark nuts and cover a SCOTUS decision out of Ohio with wide ranging implications that isn't getting much mainstream coverage

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
